title: Euler Equations in Sobolev conormal spaces
authors: Mustafa Sencer Ayd{\i}n and Igor Kukavica
abstract:
We consider the three-dimensional incompressible Euler equations in Sobolev
conormal spaces and establish local-in-time existence and uniqueness in the
half-space or channel. The initial data is Lipschitz having four
square-integrable conormal derivatives and two bounded conormal derivatives. We
do not impose any integrability or differentiability assumption for the normal
derivative.
